verses.verse: The plans <WH4633> of the heart <WH3820> belong to man <WH120>; But the answer <WH4617> of the tongue <WH3956> is from Jehovah <WH3068>.
All the ways <WH1870> of a man <WH376> are clean <WH2134> in his own eyes <WH5869>; But Jehovah <WH3068> weigheth <WH8505> the spirits <WH7307>.
Commit <WH1556> thy works <WH4639> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, And thy purposes <WH4284> shall be established <WH3559>.
Jehovah <WH3068> hath made <WH6466> everything for its own end <WH4617>; Yea <WH7563>, even the wicked for the day <WH3117> of evil <WH7451>.
Every one that is proud <WH1362> in heart <WH3820> is an abomination <WH8441> to Jehovah <WH3068>: Though hand <WH3027> join in hand <WH3027>, he shall not be unpunished <WH5352>.
By mercy <WH2617> and truth <WH571> iniquity <WH5771> is atoned <WH3722> for <WH3374>; And by the fear of Jehovah <WH3068> men depart <WH5493> from evil <WH7451>.
When a man <WH376>'s ways <WH1870> please <WH7521> Jehovah <WH3068>, He maketh even his enemies <WH341> to be at peace with him <WH7999>.
Better <WH2896> is a little <WH4592>, with righteousness <WH6666>, Than great <WH7230> revenues <WH8393> with injustice <WH4941>.
A man <WH120>'s heart <WH3820> deviseth <WH2803> his way <WH1870>; But Jehovah <WH3068> directeth <WH3559> his steps <WH6806>.
A divine sentence <WH7081> is in the lips <WH8193> of the king <WH4428>; His mouth <WH6310> shall not transgress in judgment <WH4941>.
A just <WH4941> balance <WH3976> and scales <WH6425> are Jehovah <WH3068>'s; All the weights <WH68> of the bag <WH3599> are his work <WH4639>.
It is an abomination <WH8441> to kings <WH4428> to commit <WH6213> wickedness <WH7562>; For the throne <WH3678> is established <WH3559> by righteousness <WH6666>.
Righteous <WH6664> lips <WH8193> are the delight <WH7522> of kings <WH4428>; And they love <WH157> him that speaketh <WH1696> right <WH3477>.
The wrath <WH2534> of a king <WH4428> is as messengers <WH4397> of death <WH4194>; But a wise <WH2450> man <WH376> will pacify it <WH3722>.
In the light <WH216> of the king <WH4428>'s countenance <WH6440> is life <WH2416>; And his favor <WH7522> is as a cloud <WH5645> of the latter rain <WH4456>.
How much better <WH2896> is it to get <WH7069> wisdom <WH2451> than gold <WH2742>! Yea <WH7069>, to get understanding <WH998> is rather to be chosen <WH977> than silver <WH3701>.
The highway <WH4546> of the upright <WH3477> is to depart <WH5493> from evil <WH7451>: He that keepeth <WH5341> his way <WH1870> preserveth <WH8104> his soul <WH5315>.
Pride <WH1347> goeth before <WH6440> destruction <WH7667>, And a haughty <WH1363> spirit <WH7307> before <WH6440> a fall <WH3783>.
Better <WH2896> it is to be of a lowly <WH6035> spirit <WH7307> with the poor <WH8217>, Than to divide <WH2505> the spoil <WH7998> with the proud <WH1343>.
He that giveth heed <WH7919> unto the word <WH1697> shall find <WH4672> good <WH2896>; And whoso trusteth <WH982> in Jehovah <WH3068>, happy is he <WH835>.
The wise <WH2450> in heart <WH3820> shall be called <WH7121> prudent <WH995>; And the sweetness <WH4986> of the lips <WH8193> increaseth <WH3254> learning <WH3948>.
Understanding <WH7922> is a well-spring <WH4726> of life <WH2416> unto him that hath <WH1167> it <WH4148>; But the correction of fools <WH191> is their folly <WH200>.
The heart <WH3820> of the wise <WH2450> instructeth <WH7919> his mouth <WH6310>, And addeth <WH3254> learning <WH3948> to his lips <WH8193>.
Pleasant <WH5278> words <WH561> are as a honeycomb <WH6688>, Sweet <WH4966> to the soul <WH5315>, and health <WH4832> to the bones <WH6106>.
There is <WH3426> a way <WH1870> which seemeth right <WH3477> unto <WH6440> a man <WH376>, But the end <WH319> thereof are the ways <WH1870> of death <WH4194>.
The appetite of the laboring <WH6001> man <WH5315> laboreth <WH6001> for him <WH6310>; For his mouth urgeth him thereto <WH404>.
A worthless <WH1100> man <WH376> deviseth <WH3738> mischief <WH7451>; And in his lips <WH8193> there is as a scorching <WH6867> fire <WH784>.
A perverse <WH8419> man <WH376> scattereth <WH7971> abroad strife <WH4066>; And a whisperer <WH5372> separateth <WH6504> chief friends <WH441>.
A man <WH376> of violence <WH2555> enticeth <WH6601> his neighbor <WH7453>, And leadeth <WH3212> him in a way <WH1870> that is not good <WH2896>.
He that shutteth <WH6095> his eyes <WH5869>, it is to devise <WH2803> perverse things <WH8419>: He that compresseth <WH7169> his lips <WH8193> bringeth <WH3615> evil <WH7451> to pass <WH3615>.
The hoary head <WH7872> is a crown <WH5850> of glory <WH8597>; It shall be found <WH4672> in the way <WH1870> of righteousness <WH6666>.
He that is slow <WH750> to anger <WH639> is better <WH2896> than the mighty <WH1368>; And he that ruleth <WH4910> his spirit <WH7307>, than he that taketh <WH3920> a city <WH5892>.
The lot <WH1486> is cast <WH2904> into the lap <WH2436>; But the whole disposing <WH4941> thereof is of Jehovah <WH3068>.
